author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Hard Rock Hotel at Universal Orlando Fights Breast Cancer Through 16th Annual PINKTOBER CampaignTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Hard Rock Hotel at Universal Orlando Fights Breast Cancer Through 16th Annual PINKTOBER Campaign
Bret Michaels Returns to Headline PINKTOBER Velvet Sessions for the Fourth Year, With Silent Auction Proceeds To Benefit Martha’s Angels Hard Rock Hotel at Universal Orlando is uniting musicians, supporters and survivors in honor of the brand’s 16th annual PINKTOBER® campaign.
On Thursday, September 24, Bret Michaels will officially kick off the Orlando PINKTOBER program with a special performance at Velvet Sessions. An ardent supporter of Hard Rock and the annual PINKTOBER campaign, Michaels is performing for the fourth consecutive year to help the hotel raise money and awareness for breast cancer research.
Source:- Loews Hotel & Resorts
